tool_description:
EPC translation tool, This API translates Electronic Product Code's (EPC), following the GS1 EPC Tag Data Standard (TDS) 1.13. 

An EPC (Electronic Product Code) is a unique identification number that is assigned to a product or item, similar to a barcode. It is used to track and identify products in supply chain management and inventory systems using RFID technology. EPCs can be used to track the movement of products through the supply chain, from the manufacturer to the retailer, and can pr...
title: EPC Decoder

api_list.name: EPC
api_list.description: Get request that returns the GTIN and Serial number for a given EPC.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://epc-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/epc/{epc}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "epc-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
